title: XARF v4 Connection - Login Attack Type Schema
description: Schema for brute force login attempts, credential stuffing campaigns, password spraying attacks, and repeated authentication failures against authentication systems (SSH, RDP, web logins, API authentication)

destination_ip.description: RECOMMENDED: Target IP address of the login attack

protocol.description: REQUIRED: Network protocol used in the attack

first_seen.description: REQUIRED: When attack activity was first observed

last_seen.description: OPTIONAL: When attack activity was last observed
